name: paramagnetic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A paramagnetic substance, such as aluminium, is weakly attracted to a magnet (= an object able to attract iron): Paramagnetic minerals have very low, slightly positive magnetic susceptibility. This is a highly paramagnetic element and can therefore be visualized by MRI.
More examplesFewer examplesObjects containing ferromagnetic or paramagnetic materials may be drawn into the magnetic field, posing a serious safety hazard.The flow is distributed equally past the central magnetic core, where any paramagnetic particles are retained. Oxygen and water are paramagnetic and can carry a magnetic field to all parts of the body through blood circulation.
